mapper.sql: SELECT srvc_pk, srvc_codigo_servicio, srvc_codigo_parte, srvc_fecha_desde, srvc_fecha_hasta , srvc_util_km, srvc_vacio_km, srvc_util_erp_km, srvc_vacio_erp_km , srvc_ruta_pk , srvc_cdtr1_pk , srvc_cdtr2_pk , srvc_vhcl_pk , srvc_lgps_orig_pk , srvc_lgps_dest_pk FROM tbl_servicio_srvc
mapper.select: WITH sql AS ( SELECT srvc_pk, srvc_codigo_servicio, srvc_codigo_parte, srvc_ruta_pk, srvc_cdtr1_pk, srvc_cdtr2_pk , srvc_vhcl_pk, srvc_fecha_desde, srvc_fecha_hasta , srvc_vacio_km , srvc_util_erp_km, srvc_vacio_erp_km , ( SELECT lgps_pk FROM tbl_lectura_gps_lgps WHERE 1 = 1 AND lgps_vhcl_pk = srvc_vhcl_pk AND lgps_fecha BETWEEN (srvc_fecha_desde - interval '${distanciaMaximaMinutos} minutes') AND (srvc_fecha_desde + interval '${distanciaMaximaMinutos} minutes') AND distanciaKm(lgps_latitude, lgps_longitude, ruta_orig_lat, ruta_orig_lon) < #{distanciaMaximaKm} ORDER BY distanciaKm(lgps_latitude, lgps_longitude, ruta_orig_lat, ruta_orig_lon) FETCH NEXT 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS srvc_lgps_orig_pk , ( SELECT lgps_pk FROM tbl_lectura_gps_lgps WHERE 1 = 1 AND lgps_vhcl_pk = srvc_vhcl_pk AND lgps_fecha BETWEEN (srvc_fecha_hasta - interval '${distanciaMaximaMinutos} minutes') AND (srvc_fecha_hasta + interval '${distanciaMaximaMinutos} minutes') AND distanciaKm(lgps_latitude, lgps_longitude, ruta_dest_lat, ruta_dest_lon) < #{distanciaMaximaKm} ORDER BY distanciaKm(lgps_latitude, lgps_longitude, ruta_dest_lat, ruta_dest_lon) FETCH NEXT 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS srvc_lgps_dest_pk FROM tbl_servicio_srvc s INNER JOIN tbl_ruta_ruta r ON ruta_pk = srvc_ruta_pk WHERE 1 = 1 AND srvc_ruta_pk IS NOT NULL AND srvc_vhcl_pk IS NOT NULL AND srvc_fecha_desde >= ( SELECT MIN(lgps_fecha) - interval '1 days' FROM tbl_lectura_gps_lgps ) ) SELECT srvc_pk, srvc_codigo_servicio, srvc_codigo_parte, srvc_ruta_pk, srvc_cdtr1_pk, srvc_cdtr2_pk , srvc_vhcl_pk, srvc_fecha_desde, srvc_fecha_hasta , srvc_util_erp_km, srvc_vacio_erp_km , srvc_lgps_orig_pk, srvc_lgps_dest_pk , ( SELECT SUM(lgps_distance) / 1000 FROM tbl_lectura_gps_lgps WHERE lgps_vhcl_pk = srvc_vhcl_pk AND lgps_pk BETWEEN srvc_lgps_orig_pk AND srvc_lgps_dest_pk ) AS srvc_util_km , srvc_vacio_km FROM sql ORDER BY srvc_vhcl_pk, srvc_fecha_desde
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_servicio_srvc srvc SET srvc_vacio_km = ( SELECT SUM(lgps_distance) / 1000 FROM tbl_lectura_gps_lgps WHERE lgps_vhcl_pk = srvc_vhcl_pk AND lgps_pk BETWEEN ( SELECT srvc_lgps_dest_pk + 1 FROM tbl_servicio_srvc srvcAnt WHERE srvcAnt.srvc_vhcl_pk = srvc.srvc_vhcl_pk AND srvcAnt.srvc_fecha_desde < srvc.srvc_fecha_desde ORDER BY srvc.srvc_fecha_desde - srvcAnt.srvc_fecha_desde FETCH NEXT 1 ROWS ONLY ) AND (srvc.srvc_lgps_orig_pk -1) ) WHERE srvc_pk = #{id}
